m_szDocTitle: What Ginger really is | News | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: What Ginger really is Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Billboard that smells like human sweat created to attract Zika mosquitoes Inside Magazine has the scoop on Dean Kamen's newest invention, called Ginger, or simply “It” in the news media over the past several months. Inside.com , the Web version, doesn't link to the article, but various news sources were kind enough to report on the contents of the dead tree publication. Ginger is a two-wheeled hydrogen-powered scooter. It is being built in a New Hampshire factory and is e
